title: Metacognitive Tutoring System-Based Science Problem-Solving Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Scientific Knowledge and Problem-Solving Experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-enabled environment; PC usage not permitted.

learning_goals: Learners can apply metacognitive strategies (planning, monitoring, evaluation) with over 80% accuracy in scientific problem-solving processes
Learners can distinguish and execute at least three appropriate help-seeking strategies after judging problem difficulty
Learners can record metacognitive thinking five or more times and derive improvement points through weekly reflective journaling

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
